casebody.data:
In the Matter of J.H., et al. No. 40P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. James Joyner, for Onslow County DSS. Tracie M. Jordan, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of January 2007 by Respondent to Vacate Order and Sanctions:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
